website_summaries.verdict: Unique solution to office storage and organization. Plenty of usable shelf space.
pros: Six open cubes provide easy access to a number of common objects
Works as a display shelf as well
cons: Requires additional containers or other organization solutions

website_summaries.verdict: Highly customizable cubbies at an impressive price point.
pros: Easy to build cubbies can be arranged in any order you choose
Sits at a low price point
Made from durable but lightweight fabric
Perfect size for holding square storage bins
cons: Backless cubbies will need to be placed against a wall to prevent items from falling

website_summaries.verdict: A large, economical cube bookshelf that offers lots of storage space.
pros: Each shelf consists of waterproof and dirt-proof non-woven fabric that is easy to clean
Cubes can be used to store books, kid's toys, and much more
Intended for use in a bedroom or living room
cons: Can be tough to keep the cubes in place over time

customer_reviews.title: Great deal for and awesome product!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered three sets for my kids playroom and I’m in love! It took about an hour to assemble all of it and it was super easy. I love that they are all three locked in together to make one big piece.
customer_reviews.author: Kaleena Hollenbach

customer_reviews.title: Before and after
customer_reviews.text: These are the before and after pictures from my kids game room. Books were a mess, now it looks amazing and that brings me joy!
customer_reviews.author: Rockies_mama

customer_reviews.title: Good Quality
customer_reviews.text: The best shelf I could've bought for my books. It's a great size and very durable. I will definitely be buying another one.
customer_reviews.author: Toni B.

customer_reviews.title: Great storage!
customer_reviews.text: Arrived here in a timely manner and was as described! Better in fact. Easy to assemble, sturdy and accommodating. My son who is 10 can use this well into his teenage years. Hidden neatly in his closet. Love it! Will probably order another for our daughter soon.
customer_reviews.author: Annie T

customer_reviews.title: Good Buy!
customer_reviews.text: After looking at stores and seeing the high prices. I thought i would give this a try since it was an amazon lightning deal. I wanted to get a feel before i purchase a more expensive one. After assembling this one, it was PERFECT and does what it is intended to do. I went ahead and placed another order for a second one. It seems you can connect as many as you want. Now i have more storage space and cubes all connected together. Good buy! I will be telling all my friends.
customer_reviews.author: Carlo Escalambre

customer_reviews.title: Awful, Don't waste your money
customer_reviews.text: UPDATE: the seller got ahold of me and apologized that I was not satisfied with the product. They offered to replace it or give me my money back so that was nice. However, the only gave me part of the money back, and not what I actually paid for it. But it was still a nice thing for them to do. Terrible. This product didn't even hold up for a full month. I will be throwing it away as it is too late to return it.
customer_reviews.author: Deborah

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for what I needed
customer_reviews.text: I have a pretty small space and a lot of clutter. I wanted a way to organize it all while having it stay visible and not in a ton of closed boxes. This was perfect. I bought one for the bottom of my closet and another to extend the storage space on one of my dresser counters. The shelves are quite sturdy and hold weight without shaking or creaking. I'm actually impressed with how solid it is despite not having planks as the supports but reinforced plastic sheeting that is stretched across the bars. It is definitely worth the money and super easy to take apart should I need to. I am very satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: Mary Salvani

customer_reviews.title: Great value!
customer_reviews.text: I'm very happy with this purchase. Although the instructions weren't 100% clear, I still found it fairly easy to put together by myself - it took about 20 minutes. I did not have the issue of needing two people like other reviewers have mentioned. This organizer is sturdy and works perfectly for what I was looking for. It's not a designer piece, but for the money it's a great buy!
customer_reviews.author: Kristine G.

customer_reviews.title: Was super excited about this until..
customer_reviews.text: It was holding bins of socks and underwear in my closet perfectly until it kept randomly coming un done (the pieces don’t click in or anything, they hardly stay in the slots) Finally just trashing it because it was too much of a headache to fix constantly. Idk what everyone is using this for..but again it didn’t even hold light bins with light items. Super upset :( Also-not easy to put together!
customer_reviews.author: Ronnie

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for the price!
customer_reviews.text: Simple assembly if you look at the pictures first and assemble in tiers. Completed alone in 15-20 min with no tools. I purchased the 12" cube boxes which fit perfectly. I assembled mine in a 2x3 configuration so I had extra parts, I will hang on to them in case I decide to reconfigure. I doubt it would hold a full load of books or other heavy items, but I'm using it for general office storage so it will be fine for my needs. I needs to be against a wall, and I wouldn't let kids climb on it, but so far, it seems very sturdy. I really don't understand the negative reviews about a difficult assembly. It's very straightforward.
customer_reviews.author: AmazonAddict

customer_reviews.title: Super easy
customer_reviews.text: I kinda did my own thing when building this. I didn't end up using all the pieces. It feels sturdy enough, not like it will topple over on its own. I like the design of this organizer specifically because of the open-back cubes, I was able to feed all of the cables going into my modem through the back of the organizer to try to keep the space less cluttered. It's a tough corner to keep organized but this is a much better solution than the nightstand I had there before.
customer_reviews.author: Kit

customer_reviews.title: Don’t be put off by the number of pieces in the box!
customer_reviews.text: When I first opened the box, all I saw was a lot of pieces! Therefore the opened box sat on the floor untouched for a couple weeks! When I decided to tackle the project, it turned out to be much easier to assemble than I thought. I did enlist the help of my 10 year old granddaughter which helped. The extra set of hands was great although one person can easily do it. Now that I have been using this for a while I am very happy I bought this.
customer_reviews.author: Priscilla Roberts

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: I needed extra storage for my closet and couldn’t put anything too heavy at the top and this was perfect. I had to adjust the cubes a bit so it could fit but it works great. It’s super light and I assembled it on my own (9 months pregnant) lol so it’s honestly not hard at all. It’s tedious so on my own it probably took me about an hour. It came with a wooden mallet to pound the bars together and that wasn’t very efficient so I swapped it for a hammer and it went quicker. All and all it’s a great product and doesn’t look cheap at all.
customer_reviews.author: Sharon

customer_reviews.title: Easy to assemble for one person
customer_reviews.text: Love it! Cleared up lots of space for me. Toys are now organized
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: What a nice surprise
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for an inexpensive way to do some organizing. Additionally I wanted attractiveness and sturdiness. I really had no idea what I was buying but the price was right.. What I got was a sturdy well made attractive organizer. yes, it can hold books, records, cd's, dvd's, components, bins. You name it! I am glad I bought this little gem. I don't know how it does what it does, because it is not made of wood. But the way it goes together makes it very sturdy and durable. Get yours today, you will not be sorry.
customer_reviews.author: D. Ricks

customer_reviews.title: Great for the price...bit difficult to assemble...bigger then expected
customer_reviews.text: So, this is actually a pretty good deal. It offers a lot of storage space for the cost. However, if You don't enjoy puzzles or assembling things... avoid this product as it will take more than an hour to assemble. It requires getting four poles into a slot all at the same time... and usually two will go in and two pop back out. It does allow several configurations which is useful...but it is larger then expected...should have read dimensions closer.
customer_reviews.author: DarkRubyMoon

customer_reviews.title: Perfectly reconfigurable!
customer_reviews.text: Went together quickly and easily. I reconfigured it to 3x2 to fit in my space with no problems. I got some storage fabric cubes that fit perfectly, and it's actually very sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: Jamie W

customer_reviews.title: Depends on what you're putting in the cubbies.
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to assemble, looks really great for something simple... however, I am not a fan of the bars that go through the bottom of each cubby, as it leaves two bumps and then declines out of the cubby (there's nothing flat and sturdy, it uses the tension between the rods to keep its shape.) So when I put my collectibles on there, it's tilted. So best for things like books, durable toys, etc if you decide to buy this as well. Great though!
customer_reviews.author: Inkeri Vesperya

customer_reviews.title: I'd order again
customer_reviews.text: This arrived in a rather small box. My daughter helped me, as it will take a while by yourself, but also it works best to have someone help you put the 4 poles in the holes at the same time, but could be done by one person. It is nice and sturdy and will work great for our teen daughter to store some of her things. Came with some extra parts which was nice.
customer_reviews.author: Tracy Christensen

customer_reviews.title: Clean look and easy to put together!
customer_reviews.text: I wasn’t exactly sure what to expect with this as I’ve only ever used the wooden cube shelves. When I opened this up and it had the different bars and sleeves for each layer, I wasn’t sure it would be durable enough but as soon as I started putting it together I realized I was wrong. This was so easy to put together and feels very durable and sturdy. I love that you can put it in different arrangements as well!
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: Surprising
customer_reviews.text: When I first opened and started to assembly this, I thought “yikes. This is not going to be worth the hassle of assembling because it is not going to hold up to my 3 little monsters.” However, I have been very pleasantly surprised . It’s actually exceeded my expectations since we bought it and I’m glad I got a great deal on a very functional piece!!
customer_reviews.author: FNO

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my sons who share a room. They needed more toy storage that I could easily fit into their closet . This little storage unit was perfect . It was easy to put together ( even tho the little wooden hammer that came with it broke haha , I still got it done ! ) it’s pretty sturdy for plastic! They have had it for a couple weeks now and it’s been working great for them . Very pleased with this purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Harmony Matthews

customer_reviews.title: It works
customer_reviews.text: I was a little concerned when they first arrive that these wouldn't be durable enough. Once assembled they seem sturdy. I am not using them for heavy duty items, just to help make more room in my closet. I purchase large deep fabric storage bins for this organizer to separate socks, tanks, bras. So far its doing the job and I even came back to purchase another set.
customer_reviews.author: J. Marcelo

customer_reviews.title: Good for light use
customer_reviews.text: The product is sturdy enough to handle daily small items. The fabric between the plastic tubes isn’t going to stay completely flat if you need to store anything other then clothes. It has held up well for me and came with plenty of extra parts incase one or two break. I would buy it again for temporary storage.
customer_reviews.author: Luke H.

customer_reviews.title: I want to order more
customer_reviews.text: It was easy to assemble. One of the rare times I am happy with an item I have not ordered before. Most things do not live up to their descriptions. There are 4 support bars for each shelf floor and makes it tight and sturdy. We tried to make it 2 shelves wide and 3 shelves tall, like a book case. It worked and I think it is great!!
customer_reviews.author: Thejet61

customer_reviews.title: I think its a winner
customer_reviews.text: I didnt think this would hold my jeans but it does once its put together you can see the sturdiness. And you can hold more items than you think. I was able to clean a chair and dresser off storing clothes that didnt fit in my dresser. Im glad i took a chance on this. I hardly give 5 stars. I hope i wont have to change my opinion
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Looks great and does its job
customer_reviews.text: It keeps our bedroom looking neat and organized. But I'm only giving this four stars though since we bought another set after a few months which we were hoping to add to our existing shelves, but they don't fit: the bar and hole sizes between the two batches are different.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: These are great for storage cubes!
customer_reviews.text: These are really great if you use storage cubes. I had previously purchased the wire cube holders and that was the biggest mistake ever! They fell apart nonstop and were incredibly hard to put together, only to fall apart at the slightest movement. These ones were fairly easy to assemble. I did not get the exact number of pieces that I needed so I was only able to assemble 5 holders instead of 6, but I made it work.
customer_reviews.author: Maria Ringer

customer_reviews.title: Because of the material itself, this unit is not ...
customer_reviews.text: Because of the material itself, this unit is not very stable, and connecting tubes get loose sometimes. I am thinking to use a glue or some kind of nutlock to fix tubes in place. But for the price, I am willing to make some adjustments.
customer_reviews.author: Yerzhan Ospanov

customer_reviews.title: Not what I expected, but good so far
customer_reviews.text: I was expecting something a little more substantial, but after putting this together, it seems like it will be pretty sturdy. The compartments are a little more narrow than I thought (but that is probably my misunderstanding of the measurements). I haven't loaded it with anything yet, but I don't have any complaints so far.
customer_reviews.author: Courtney F.

customer_reviews.title: sturdy
customer_reviews.text: I've had this product for several months now. I mainly use it for books and have a few storage cubbies with stuff in them. Its awesome! A little bigger than I thought it would be, but only by a few inches and honestly I like it. It seems pretty sturdy so far. Assembly was a little difficult as some of the pieces are a little tight, but I was able to do it by myself. I wouldn't like put your heaviest books on every shelf or super crazy heavy things in general but its pretty sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: Sammey

customer_reviews.title: Affordable price, looks clean and neat. Easy to assemble.
customer_reviews.text: I got this to help organize my books, accessories, and stationary. It is easy to assemble alone, took me about 20 minutes. I got the 9-cube and 6-cube sets to make this arrangement. It is great for my small room! Can customize easily to your own need and design.
customer_reviews.author: Lynn V

customer_reviews.title: Easy to assemble
customer_reviews.text: I always ask people to assemble any projects I want to be done. But, this time, I actually did it myself. It's easy to assemble after at least 30 minutes of reading the instructions. They're a bit confusing so I had to put two and two together. After I knew what I was doing, it took me a good 45 minutes to set up. Just change the instructions lol. But other than that, it holds up decently for clothes.
customer_reviews.author: anamoa

customer_reviews.title: Great product for the price
customer_reviews.text: this is perfect for my needs. I thought it would be too small, but the tote bins fir well. Even though it is plastic cloth and rods its very sturdy. I have only had it a month. but I like it so well, I plan to order this again. I also put it together by myself in about 2 hrs. 👌
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Like it
customer_reviews.text: I bought this 6 shelf set because I have a whole lot of extra space in the top of my closet. I took the advise of others to build this slowly and I’m glad I did- I can see how this could get frustrating. I’m intending to keep seasonal clothes in it so nothing heavy. For my use, this is perfect.
customer_reviews.author: MS014

customer_reviews.title: Sturdier then it seems
customer_reviews.text: I was very surprised with the storage unit. When I first got it, I thought it was going to be flimsy and break as soon as my two year old saw it. I was surprised to find out I was wrong! Its easy to put together. The holes the metal poles go in are tight, but they supply a cute wooden hammer to ensure you get a good fit.
customer_reviews.author: amanda

customer_reviews.title: It Fits
customer_reviews.text: Looks great. More or less an easy install. I assumed it would be largely all plastic with attachments but there cloth like material, plastic and metal pipes that put it all together but happy with it's purpose. I should really review the specs! Not flimsy and it helps me get things a bit more organised! Fits the decor of my space
customer_reviews.author: M. Rogers

customer_reviews.title: Pretty sturdy actually
customer_reviews.text: Pretty sturdy actually. Fairly easy to put together as well. Once assembled it's very light and easy to move around to where you'd like to place it. I plan on order a couple more.
customer_reviews.author: QueenDominga

customer_reviews.title: Garbage
customer_reviews.text: If you like to spend money on trash then buy this product. Absolute garbage. It's disgusting that it's even being sold and marketed as it is. I could have used the cardboard box it came in to make something more sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: Peace Love Knits

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I bought quite a few of these for book storage. They went together easily and looked really great. I watched a few YouTube videos to make sure I was building them properly. They seemed to be really sturdy. Two days later, they fell apart and I found books all over the floor. I've since bought other brands and they hold up fine.
customer_reviews.author: LucyZoe

customer_reviews.title: Good bookshelf
customer_reviews.text: I do like it but it’s not 100 sturdy. I use it as a book shelf by my desk. It does take some assistance with assembling as you have to stretch it to input the poles. Took about 20 minutes for the whole thing. Shipped fast. I would buy again if I needed to. Also good to use with the drawers.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa

customer_reviews.title: Just Put Up, Happy, Durable
customer_reviews.text: When I first realized the "shelves" were fabric (ICYMI like did, yes it's FABRIC), I almost packed it right back up. But i put it together and was pleasantly surprised, the fabric is pulled tight so it can really handle a good amount of weight. There are poles that are beneath each layer of fabric too. Took about 30 min to put together. The depth is skinnier than I expected, but when I put the 12x12 cubes in it looks good, doesn't stil out.
customer_reviews.author: Christina

customer_reviews.title: Don't waste your money on this item.
customer_reviews.text: I had this product for a little over 3 months in the box prior to putting it together. Unfortunately, this product is not worth the money. It falls apart once assembled. You cannot put anything with any weight on it. It definitely does not hold up to the expectation that I had when I ordered it. If given the opportunity I would return it for a refund. Trust me, don't waste your money on this.
customer_reviews.author: Marilyn

customer_reviews.title: Storage capacity is fairly good...but
customer_reviews.text: The assembly of this cube took me nearly 2 hours. The cloth fabric isn't quite durable in material. It easily tears, given the fact that you have to stretch them to fit into the connectors that are uneven and have different sized ends. Overall, I would give this item a 3.8 simply due to the torn fabric and uneven poles that I currently have and I am not sure how long it will hold up. I like how light weight it is, but I can't say that I'm extremely satisfied with the product. There were quite a bit of positive reviews, so maybe my item was somewhat defective.
customer_reviews.author: Amber

customer_reviews.title: So much more sturdy than I had expected
customer_reviews.text: I originally purchased it for my closet to organize some things however my husband saw it and let me know how much he'd like it to be a "shoe rack/organizer" for the mud room, now I'm purchasing another one.
customer_reviews.author: Marnyek

customer_reviews.title: Piece of junk
customer_reviews.text: I am good at putting things together. This thing took me forever. It's flimsy and the poles constantly pop out when putting it together. If I wasn't past the point of return, I'd send this hunk of junk back.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer H.

customer_reviews.title: Very Cool
customer_reviews.text: I was confused on how to build it at first and thought it was not going to be sturdy enough. But it surprisingly is once you make it! Once I figured out how the pieces went, it was easy. I love it. Probably going to buy another one to connect it with this one to store more things :)
customer_reviews.author: Aj Castillo

customer_reviews.title: Easy to assemble
customer_reviews.text: My husband was sceptical about it but once I put it together and added the books toys and knick knacks to it, is perfect. What is great is that I can expand it with another unit or add bins for toys and if I choose I can move it to the closet for easy clothes storage. So many possibilities but for now it makes a perfect corner storage.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: OK for the money
customer_reviews.text: So, for the price you pay, it's ok. They're cheap, for sure, and you can't really build much with them. The cloth that covers the metal is a cheap plastic, and it feels cheap all around
customer_reviews.author: Caleb S

customer_reviews.title: Can’t combine multiple sets due to different sizes.
customer_reviews.text: I ordered 3 sets of these cubes, in hopes to combine them in sorts. Unfortunately the tubes and the holes are different sizes, so it’s hard and impossible to combine them. The metal bars have different thickness, and the holes are different sizes. So either holes are too loose, or the bars are too big it won’t fit. I wish I had known this before I bought multiple sets. They are easy to install besides this problem, but they are also easy to break. Hammered the sides, and some of the plastic cracked. But it serves its purpose.
customer_reviews.author: JTing

customer_reviews.title: GREAT!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Pros: I love this. Allows me to put up lots of books and toys, and it doesn't take up but a small corner of the room. Great buy! Directions were easy to follow. Safe for those with small children, because you don't have to worry about them hurting themselves. Cons: None that comes to mind.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good storage solution
customer_reviews.text: Got this and unboxed it put it together with my kid who is 9 in under an hour. Comes with a little mallet to put in place. Have not used it to hold anything as of yet so can't say anything for sturdyness. Decent priced I am already thinking of buying another. Just wished they would send a few extras so you could actually customize it like they say.
customer_reviews.author: amanda

customer_reviews.title: LOVE it! Get 12x12 cubes for it!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for organizing my closet! Construction is no brainer and it is sturdy! The size 12x12 cubes fit perfectly! I already bought two 6’s and now I am going to buy one 9’s . Love it!
customer_reviews.author: Felicity

customer_reviews.title: great for storage
customer_reviews.text: Got this as a bookshelf and will be getting another probably for board games I have. I easily changed the configuration to a 2 rows 3 in stead of the 1x2x3 format shown in the picture (that's just how I wanted it is all).
customer_reviews.author: Janissary

customer_reviews.title: Great closet organizer
customer_reviews.text: Purchased these shelves to fit in my closet. We just moved and I had significantly less space for clothes. It was easy to assemble, took about 10 min. It gets the job done & helps organize my closet. The only reason I didn’t give it 5 stars was because the quality was a little bit cheap. But for the price point, I’m happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie Puga

customer_reviews.title: Great storage - bigger than the picture makes you think!
customer_reviews.text: I just needed a bookcase, something cheap for my school things. I saw this at a very reasonable price, and figured it would be small but would do the job. I was wrong! This is a good medium-sized case that will fit nearly ten books per cubby! I am very happy with it. The assembly was confusing at first, but does quickly become easy and actually enjoyable once you get it. It's extremely light-weight, so it'll be easy to transport when I move!
customer_reviews.author: Grace Szatkowski

customer_reviews.text: PROS: -Super easy to setup. -Sturdy -Good Materials -package came in perfect condition with no damage. CONS: -Instructions are kinda weaksauce (but it's so easy to assemble you don't even really need them except for reference)
customer_reviews.author: Sky

customer_reviews.title: Useless directions but good product for price.
customer_reviews.text: Only reason I’m giving this a 1 star in easy to assemble is because the directions are not clear and are useless. Just use your common sense. I will say it looks to be a nice shelf for what it cost. We’re using it to store my daughters homeschool books.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not much wrong, the instructions were useless.
customer_reviews.text: I love how it's small enough to fit into my very small closet, but each cube is big enough to store a lot. The intructions were almost no help at all, the wording was confusing and the pictures didn't make much sense, I mostly had to figure it out myself. But over all the product is very sturdy and seems durable. The only thing I would really complain about is how the seams are heat pressed instead of with glue or something. A few of the edges came apart really easily when putting it together.
customer_reviews.author: Zoie Ann

customer_reviews.title: The organizer is easy to put together and you have options as far ...
customer_reviews.text: The organizer is easy to put together and you have options as far as how to configure. I set it up on just two levels. The written instructions are not well written, looks like a google translation from Chinese to English, but other than that, I was able to figure it out.
customer_reviews.author: HL

customer_reviews.title: Nice price, relatively sturdy and helps keep things organized!
customer_reviews.text: Liked how actually sturdy it is. Takes a little time and patience to put together, but nice how you can assemble it to fit your space. Will be a good item to bring Back and forth to college. Definitely helps keep things organized! Good price and came quick!
customer_reviews.author: Fun Stuff!

customer_reviews.title: Great for my needs
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to store my yarn, it has worked great for I need. I like how the cubes decrease as the tower gets taller that way I can put storage tubs to hold my hooks, measuring tape and other crochet items. It was easy to assemble, pretty simple and to the point. I am not sure I would trust to hold the heavier items but does just great for what I need it for. It’s not wobbly.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Waste of money.
customer_reviews.text: Do not buy this shelf. I have had to reassemble it several times. I used it to store snacks for my kids and it cannot take any weight. I am so disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Jenova Easley

customer_reviews.title: Easy No-Fuss Cube Storage
customer_reviews.text: I very much appreciated how easy these are to assemble compared to most furniture. They are strong enough to hold 13" cubes filled with clothes and even have random stuff on the top of them. The cubes do hang over the edge a bit and can sometimes be difficult to slide out but overall I am very satisfied for the price.
customer_reviews.author: ZYX89

customer_reviews.title: Affordable, good quality
customer_reviews.text: Great storage shelf. It's a little hard to assemble because the metal rodes pop out as you move on to the next cube until you have enough assembled that makes it more stable. The price and quality is definetly worth it though and looks great in my living room!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Hard to assemble + not sturdy enough
customer_reviews.text: It is difficult to assemble this product. The metal part seems sturdy, but the fabric/plastic sheet that is used as a rack is thin as paper. I have to return this product as it is not usable for the purpose I purchased it for. I am not sure it is a durable product. I must say I am impressed with their customer service... Friendly and professional!
customer_reviews.author: Mo

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: Best. Decision. Ever. Very good choice in terms of what the type of storage I'm looking for. Slick, simple and easy to assemble. Bought multiples as well. Very happy Purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Chiyo-chan

customer_reviews.title: Great for storage
customer_reviews.text: I used this storage on the kids play room and it is very sturdy, I love it because we can separate the toys by style and is easier for the kids to find what they are looking for. The seller is amazing and provide us with great customer service
customer_reviews.author: Gabz

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Works great. I like that you can choose any kind of layout that you wanna add to it or take away. It’s Perfect for what we needed.
customer_reviews.author: Munday

customer_reviews.title: Actually sturdy
customer_reviews.text: Actually sturdier than you’d expect for plastics. Shelves were snug and tight. I had my doubts but was actually impressed.
customer_reviews.author: Richard Nicholson

customer_reviews.title: Cheap quality but convenient storage
customer_reviews.text: This is strong once it's together but rather cheap parts and flimsy while assembling. One of the fabric/plastic shelves ripped during assembly. Doesn't require tools or any know-how to assemble but took longer than expected as plastic requires slight bending and pulling to make it fit. The pros of this are that you can put it together whatever in a combination that fits in your space, and it will come apart fast and easy for moving.
customer_reviews.author: Claudia

customer_reviews.title: Easy to assemble, and it just works!
customer_reviews.text: No complaints! I set it up easily by myself without needing any tools, and it works perfectly for its intended purpose. I'm using it to organize some items in my closet, not sure if I'd use it in a more "visible" space, but for a closet, it's great!
customer_reviews.author: Cristi Jayo

customer_reviews.title: Great, Lightweight Cubby Storage
customer_reviews.text: I wanted something inexpensive for storage and this is it! Super easy to move around I think it weighs about a pound. Comes with extra fabric shelves which is good as I suspect with usage the others may tear or rip. Don't know how long it will last but it's cute, kind of a modern/minimalist style and cheered right up with baskets. Happy so far, reason for 4 stars is not sure how durable it will be, slightly less substantial looking than the photos, but for the most part the photos as accurate.
customer_reviews.author: DF

customer_reviews.title: Great price, great product
customer_reviews.text: Easy to assemble. The entire storage case is lightweight as such but can hold a lot of items. Sturdy product and definitely worth the price.
customer_reviews.author: Aparna

customer_reviews.title: worth the money
customer_reviews.text: they perform as expected, had mine for two years or so and they still hold up just fine with no issues
customer_reviews.author: Barry Allen

customer_reviews.title: Great, basic, economic storage option.
customer_reviews.text: Used it as extra storage for clothes that I don't want to bother hanging up. This design holds up very well; once all the cubes are assembled, there is very little sway. Great price. There's nothing more I would want from this cube storage, it does everything I want, which is to just store clothes. All the little pieces come in a compact box, easy to assemble with the basic instructions provided. Great for students (or anyone) who may need to move often.
customer_reviews.author: Dubs

customer_reviews.title: There’s only one way to go...
customer_reviews.text: I was moving to fast when I saw them at a discount and didn’t realize that they can only be setup one way, the way that’s in the picture. Though I was able to get three standing straight up solo, and could had gotten four in a column. I now have extras put way b/c i thought I’d be able to build two separate columns for another room and mines, but nope.
customer_reviews.author: Untitled Customer

customer_reviews.title: Cheap option to organize
customer_reviews.text: OK to assemble, comes with a little hammer. For the price, as expected. Plastic and fabric like plastic. Not for heavy items, especially the higher you go. Tends to lean to the side.
customer_reviews.author: Des

customer_reviews.title: You have to assemble the whole thing.
customer_reviews.text: If you're not in a hurry it may be a good match for your project. However I don't like all of the bits and pieces it comes in. It's total assembly. There's no partial assembly. I purchased this thinking it was already assembled because I needed to set 3 big craft fair booths of which you have a set time for setup. Couldn't even use it.
customer_reviews.author: D M Nichols

customer_reviews.title: SUPER NICE UNIT
customer_reviews.text: THIS UNIT WAS SO EASY TO PUT TOGETHER AND IS EXACTLY NEEDED FOR MY BATH. LOVE IT AND SUPER FAST SHIPPING. GREAT SELLER
customer_reviews.author: Debra C. Wesoloski

customer_reviews.title: I love the mallet that comes with it
customer_reviews.text: I loved these storage shelves they were fun and easy to assemble..even came with a couple extra parts in case I buy another one or need to replace pieces..very great value
customer_reviews.author: Chan

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and neat
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what i needed..thought there where the polyurathane ones but just notice those are the other ones lol regardless great buy for the price
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Missing pieces
customer_reviews.text: I was waiting on this for so long that even tho there was supposed to be 48 pieces and I received 34 pieces, I made it work regardless. I was very disappointed that I was short and didnt even have the energy to go through the refund process.
customer_reviews.author: Raven Brown

customer_reviews.title: Save your money
customer_reviews.text: This thing is impossible to put together. You get one side in and the other side pops out. I am throwing mine out which sucks because I boought 5 of these! Lots of bad words said today!
customer_reviews.author: Rastamomma

customer_reviews.title: Easy to build and move
customer_reviews.text: I have moved once since buying this. It has been really easy to build and is one of the pieces of furniture that was the easiest to move yet made the most shelf space at my new place. I try not to have it carry heavy books or items like they did in the picture so I mainly use it for clothes, books, board games, and light bags
customer_reviews.author: Sean Wang

customer_reviews.title: Simple enough to have
customer_reviews.text: Simple and does the job well. I bought 1 previously and recently purchased a second one to expand it. The pieces fit together well and match the decor. I was worried about the quality and so far I am not disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: cynthia pichler

customer_reviews.title: Perfect use for my needs
customer_reviews.text: My kids closets are slanted by like an A-frame house would be, these were the perfect solution to a lot of unused, unorganized space. I bought one for each closet and by the second one I was a pro and putting it together, in about 15 minutes. I was a little disappointed when I open the box to 100 pieces but it went fast. Hope they hold up and given where they are going to be located I’d say they’ll be fine. I’m not sure I’d recommend for daily use of storing toys or something with wild children but as an organization piece they’re great.
customer_reviews.author: Jodie Vogel

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and easy. Perfect for my organizational needs!
customer_reviews.text: Works great for what I needed it for and fits perfectly in my closet. Easy to assemble and disassemble for moves.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Product would not stay assembled, extremely fragile
customer_reviews.text: The product seemed/looked easy to assemble and durable from the box and pictures, but when upon opening it, there was over 50 pieces and took over an hour to assemble. After assembly, after a week or so, the organizer would fall apart and would not stay together. Some of the pieces were too short and would not stay attached to the support system. Overall after two months of use, the organizer had to be thrown away because it was not durable enough to hold anything.
customer_reviews.author: al671

customer_reviews.title: Fits perfectly and great  price
customer_reviews.text: It was easy to assemble. It just took a while because of all the many pieces. The cheap wooden mallet to bang the tubes in the holes broke during installation but I easily replaced it with a hammer. It definitely meets my needs for organizing clothes in my closet. Would consider buying another for other closets.
customer_reviews.author: WLWM1

customer_reviews.title: Great expandable storage solution
customer_reviews.text: I bought a set of these to help organize a bedroom in my house. It worked so great I bought a second set. You can't store really heavy items on this but it works great for kids toys and books.
customer_reviews.author: Mainer88

customer_reviews.title: Clutter free
customer_reviews.text: Super easy! Super affordable! And I’m even able to be creative with it! Definitely suggest this over anything else. Now my vanity and tv stand is clutter free! I put all my books and dvds and hair products in there. Soooo convenient!
customer_reviews.author: Iris Sev

customer_reviews.title: Good value
customer_reviews.text: Fabric does feel a little flimsy but seems to have a Hugh value for the cost. Assembly is simple
customer_reviews.author: CJ

customer_reviews.title: Weak
customer_reviews.text: It’s very unstable, made from plastic and it can’t gold too much weight. It rocks around a lot and the sides and bottom are some weird flimsy material. For things that aren’t very heavy it works fine.
customer_reviews.author: Genbon

customer_reviews.title: They send an extra fabric piece - it's not missing a part.
customer_reviews.text: This was very easy to put together and surprisingly sturdy. I bought a similar product from another brand and it was the complete opposite. I would buy this again.
customer_reviews.author: Ctessier

customer_reviews.title: Good buy, bit of effort
customer_reviews.text: I use this product as a shoe rack. You can adjust the build a bit to fit multiple size spaces, and the cloth is decent sturdy. I put it together myself and without a hammer, as I didn't realize I needed one at first, but I managed to get it to stay together just fine.
customer_reviews.author: Tori

customer_reviews.title: HORRIBLE
customer_reviews.text: This storage unit is very cheaply made and poor quality. I'm looking to return it.
customer_reviews.author: Dena B. Chism

customer_reviews.title: I'll be purchasing more
customer_reviews.text: This product is inexpensive, easy assembly,sturdy and just great! I'll be ordering more.
customer_reviews.author: David A. LaRiccia

customer_reviews.title: Seems good- pay attention to dimensions.
customer_reviews.text: Seems fairly sturdy. I did return though. I appreciate the concept however I bought this to replace the wire cubes I had in my closet and it’s much smaller than I needed. The depth isn’t nearly enough. I should have read the dimensions before purchasing.
customer_reviews.author: william durando

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for my inner yarn hoarder !
customer_reviews.text: This is a extremely great value ! This is nice and sturdy! My husband put it together and it didn’t take him long ! I use it to store my yarn ! I plan on buying a second one ! Im so very happy with this purchase !
customer_reviews.author: mobchk

product_meta.title: TomCare Cube Storage 6-Cube Closet Organizer Shelves Storage Cubes Organizer Cubby Bins Cabinets Bookcase Organizing Storage Shelves for Bedroom Living Room Office, Black
product_meta.description:
Description:
Keep Your Room Well Organized
No more worry about arranging too many toys or books. The cube organizer is designed for storing all sorts of items. Each cube you can place different stuff, so that your room can be well organized.

Multiple Function
There are 6 cubes in each set of cube storage, every cube is large enough to organize your clothes, books, shoes, or toys. Also, it is convenient to store anything you like. And it is a good choice for collectors to collect things.

Modern Design
With its simply structure and elegant black color, it will match any type of your bedroom, living room or office. Also, it is very easy to clean, which is the ideal furniture.

Sturdy Structure
The cube organizer is made of high quality, waterproof, lightweight and environmental fabric. The cloth covered cardboard flip- down bottom adds stability and strength for moving cube in and out of your storage area / shelving. And the max weight of each cube is 13.5 lbs.

Specifications:
Color:Black
Weight: 4.4lb
Material: Plastic and water-proof non-woven fabric
Product Dimension: 41.3x12x43 inches
Size for Each Cube: 13.4x 12x13.6 inches

Package Included:
1 x Storage Cube
1 x Assembly Menu
feature_bullets: Package Dimensions: 11.684 L x 40.386 H x 30.734 W (centimeters)
